name: E-Waste Collection Drive
content: Join us for a dedicated drive to collect and recycle electronic waste responsibly. This event aims to reduce the environmental impact of e-waste by encouraging proper disposal and recycling practices. Bring your old gadgets and help us make a difference!

name: Sustainable Tech Workshop
content: Discover innovative ways to integrate sustainability into technology at this hands-on workshop. Learn about eco-friendly practices, sustainable product design, and how to minimize the environmental footprint of tech innovations.

name: Electronic Repair & Reuse Fair
content: This fair promotes the repair and reuse of electronic devices to extend their lifecycle and reduce waste. Join us to learn repair techniques, explore reuse opportunities, and contribute to a circular economy.

name: E-Waste Awareness Seminar
content: Attend this seminar to gain insights into the growing issue of e-waste and its impact on the environment. Experts will discuss challenges, solutions, and the role of individuals and organizations in tackling e-waste effectively.

name: Green Electronics Expo
content: Explore the latest eco-friendly electronics and sustainable tech solutions at this expo. Meet innovators, discover green technologies, and learn how the industry is evolving to address environmental concerns.

name: Battery Recycling Awareness
content: Learn about the importance of proper battery recycling and how it can prevent environmental hazards. This event will provide practical tips and resources for safely disposing of used batteries.

name: Tech Waste Policy Discussion
content: Join policymakers, industry leaders, and environmental advocates for a discussion on effective strategies and policies for managing tech waste. Share your ideas and contribute to shaping a sustainable future.

name: Gadget Recycling Workshop
content: Participate in this hands-on workshop to learn how to recycle old gadgets sustainably. Gain practical skills and knowledge to turn your outdated devices into valuable resources.

name: Eco-Friendly Tech Innovations
content: Discover groundbreaking innovations in eco-friendly technology. This event showcases advancements that prioritize sustainability and environmental responsibility in the tech industry.

name: Zero-Waste Electronics Fair
content: Celebrate zero-waste practices in electronics at this fair. Explore innovative solutions, meet like-minded individuals, and learn how to contribute to a waste-free future in the tech industry.

name: Upcycling Old Devices Meetup
content: Join a community of enthusiasts to share ideas and techniques for upcycling old electronic devices. Learn creative ways to give new life to outdated gadgets while reducing waste.

name: Smart E-Waste Management Forum
content: Engage with experts and stakeholders at this forum focused on smart e-waste management. Explore innovative approaches, share best practices, and collaborate on solutions to address the growing e-waste challenge.
